ygData.subject: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [g4mntofcr@SCHOFIELD-EMH1.ARMY.MIL]
ygData.msgSnippet: I plan on trying the new Halfling only Super Leatherfoot Raider cap.  I can easily obtain one for the cost of a dirk (25-40pp) and I bet some halfling down
ygData.messageBody:
I plan on trying the new Halfling only 'Super' Leatherfoot Raider cap. I
can easily obtain one for the cost of a dirk (25-40pp) and I bet some
halfling down there would make the trade.

Dean

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 1:44 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Well I tried to get a Guise this past weekend but was unsuccessful. When I
got to Lower Guk there was a party camping the assasin room and several
people in the group didn't have a Guise yet and were unwilling to let me
purchase looting rights. They even laughed when I offered to give PP for
it. At their level PP was worthless. One of them told me he would have
considered letting me loot the Guise if I had something of value to trade
him. The problem with this is that there aren't too many items a 25th level
player can obtain that a 35+ level player doesn't already have. Guess I
will just have to wait until I'm in my 30s and get one for myself.

Galtin of E'ci





> Thats a good idea. I'm certain that with either my charm or
> my cash,
> someone will let me loot the Guise. My main concern though
> is not getting
> killed while I'm down there. Any suggestions on how a 24
> bard can pull this
> off?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> > Step number one, if you get down there and a group is
> camping the mob that
> > drops the guise
> > (Assassin? I don't remember) is to just ask if they would
> mind if you
> > looted it. Be creative,
> > offer to sing them a song or something in exchange for it.
> >
> > Chances are, they're nice people who all have masks anyway
> and just want
> > to pull Serrated Bone
> > Dirks and they'll happily let you loot the mask if you
> entertain them.
>
>
>

the subject lol.
